  • Class
    Description
    ConversionAdapter
    The ConversionAdapter class is a custom RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of currency conversions.
    ConversionAdapter.OnItemClickListener
    Interface to handle regular click events on the conversion items.
    ConversionAdapter.OnLongClickListener
    Interface to handle long click events on the conversion items.
    ConversionDAO
    The ConversionDAO class represents a data object for currency conversions.
    ConversionDB
    Database helper class for managing the conversions table.
    ConversionDetailFragment
    A fragment that displays the details of a currency conversion.
    ConversionMain
    The ConversionMain activity handles the currency conversion process, displaying conversion results in a RecyclerView, and managing user interactions with the app.
